commit.message:
re PR target/18761 (C++ ABI bug on OS X with embed types)

2005-01-11  Andrew Pinski  <pinskia@physics.uc.edu>

        PR target/18761
        * config/rs6000/rs6000.c (rs6000_special_round_type_align):
        Skip all DECLs except for FIELD_DECLs.

From-SVN: r93193

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,9 @@
+2005-01-11  Andrew Pinski  <pinskia@physics.uc.edu>
+
+	PR target/18761
+	* config/rs6000/rs6000.c (rs6000_special_round_type_align):
+	Skip all DECLs except for FIELD_DECLs.
+
